| [![](media/redquack-hex.png){height="140"}](https://github.com/dylanpieper/redquack) | redquack transfers [REDCap](https://project-redcap.org) data to [DuckDB](https://duckdb.org) with minimal memory overhead, designed for large datasets that exceed available RAM |
| [![](media/hellmer-hex.png){height="140"}](https://github.com/dylanpieper/hellmer) | Enable sequential and parallel processing for all chat models and features supported by [ellmer](https://ellmer.tidyverse.org), favoring speed and feedback with response streaming over delayed responses from batch APIs, which are cheaper but slower and not supported by all LLM providers |
| [![](media/samesies-hex.png){height="140"}](https://github.com/dylanpieper/samesies) | samesies compares lists of texts, factors, or numerical values to measure their similarity |
| [![](media/SSJS-Hex.svg){height="140"}](https://github.com/dylanpieper/shinysurveyjs) | shinysurveyjs integrates [SurveyJS](https://surveyjs.io/) with [Shiny](#0) to interface with a [PostgreSQL](#0) database and create dynamic survey experiences |
